job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Role Software EngineerbrbrWe are seeking a Software Engineer who will be responsible for developing and maintaining one of our communitysupported products You will have the exciting challenge of designing and building robust and scalable software using a cuttingedge technology stack as we seek to unlock the value of our music data and modernize our products and user experience The role works as part of an Engineering team and assists this team with estimation and prioritization of development efforts participating in architectural planning discussions  Our engineers tackle highly complex technical challenges in collaboration with our product and design teams to solve for a variety of problems ranging in complexity and scope  Our engineers have an opportunity to make significant impacts to our architecture and product features as well as our performance and scalability   brbrNeed to HavebrBachelors degree BABS from fouryear college or university in mathcomputer science related field or equivalent work experience brExtensive experience working with production systems troubleshooting performance tuning optimizing refactoring etcbrExtensive experience with Python and MySQLbrDeep understanding of Software Engineering processes such as version control build and configuration management automated deployments automated testing etcbrbrNice to Havebr	Knowledge of Javascript React and eCommerce applications would be a plusbr	Possess knowledge of the functions operation and mission of the businessbr	Comfort working in an agile software development process that is highly agile and iterativebr	Ability to operate by Discogs principles ofbr	Results driven Relentlessly pursue our goals and honor our commitmentsbr	Communication Ask questions share observations state factsbr	Adaptability Embrace failure through experiential learning move forwardbr	Impact Contribute to the story of Discogs successbrbrInterested please share your resumes to muraliquadrantresourcecom
